document_data.name: Tazlan Rilzeer
document_data.mainbody: '''Tazlan Rilzeer''' was a sea-captain who lived in [[Waterdeep]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: Tazlan was the captain of the ''[[Coin Toss]]''â€”a vessel owned by the noble [[Arilosa Adarbrent]] who was a financier of the [[Order of the Gauntlet]]. He had a priest of [[Helm]] serve as the ship's medic.
document_data.History: In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]] Tazlan was hired by the Order of the Gauntlet to travel in search of the ''[[morkoth (ship)|Morkoth]]''
